feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 2:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -19.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
